snippet: Susan Merlucci Reno, who stands 5 feet tall, is a professional boxer and trainer who helps coach the Fire Department’s Bravest Boxing squad.
abstract: Corey Kilgannon Character Study column interviews former Golden Gloves champion Susan Merlucci Reno, who trains and coaches members of Bravest Boxing, New York City Fire Dept's boxing squad.
lead_paragraph: Susan Merlucci Reno, who stands 5 feet tall, is a professional boxer and trainer who helps coach the Fire Department’s Bravest Boxing squad.

headline.main: Lighting a Fire Under New York’s Bravest Boxing Squad
